downloadTitle: Accounts Receivable in Microsoft Dynamics SL 2015
downloadDescription: ​This training provides individuals with the knowledge and skills to build a comprehensive understanding of the Accounts Receivable module in Microsoft Dynamics SL 2015.​
detailsSection:
Audience This training is intended for partners, end users, IT professionals or accounting professionals who utilize or maintain the Accounts Payable module in Microsoft Dynamics SL.At Training Material Completion On completing this course you will be well acquainted with:
  • A solid understanding of the tr​ansaction cycle along with the various methods of producing documents and transactions, in the Accounts Receivable module.
  • An understanding of how the transaction cycle fits in with the Microsoft Dynamics SL accounting cycle, and how to complete the accounting cycle.
  • Exposure you to other important features of the Microsoft Dynamics SL Accounts Receivable system, such as payment application reversal, finance charge calculation, aging, and small balance write-off.
Prerequisites Before reviewing this training, it is recommended that individuals have:
  • General knowledge of Microsoft Windows
  • Knowledge of basic navigation functions in Microsoft Dynamics SL.
  • General Ledger training course.
